section.45: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Uqbah bin 'Amir Al-Juhani:that the Prophet (ï·º) said: "Some Ayat have been revealed to me the likes of which have not been seen: Qul A'udhu Birabbin-Nas until the end of the Surah and Qul A'udhu Birabbil-Falaq until the end of the Surah
